Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:11#1008#Red Lash pirates} and {@LinkCreature:11#1004#diggers} are carrying cargo around. That ain't new.

But they're being really careful with the cargo. Never seen that before.

They aren't pilfering from it, so it's not delicate treasure. My guess? Explosives. Whatever it is, seize itâ€”but be careful!

Just as I thought...bombs. Enough of this stuff, and you could sink a fleet...or wreck a city.

But pirates don't use explosives much, because they don't like blowing up their own treasure. Hmmm...
Hurry up and seize those explosives before the Red Lash does something terrible with them!
